meanings.definition: Capable of giving rise to any cell type or a complete organism.
meanings.sent1: The totipotent stem cells could develop into any part of the body.
meanings.sent2: Scientists are studying totipotent cells to understand their full potential.
meanings.sent3: The totipotent cells were feeling very confident about their future career paths.
meanings.sent4: Her creativity was totipotent, able to blossom into any form of art.
meanings.sent5: The totipotent nature of the seed held the promise of endless possibilities.

meanings.definition: Having the ability to differentiate into any type of cell.
meanings.sent1: The totipotent cells were like versatile artists, able to transform into any cell type.
meanings.sent2: The scientist marveled at the totipotent cells' remarkable adaptability.
meanings.sent3: The totipotent cells were the ultimate shape-shifters in the body.
meanings.sent4: Her mind was totipotent, capable of adapting to any situation.
meanings.sent5: The totipotent cells' flexibility was crucial for their role in development.

meanings.definition: Possessing the potential to develop into any type of cell in the body.
meanings.sent1: The totipotent cells held the key to endless possibilities in the body.
meanings.sent2: Doctors were amazed by the totipotent cells' regenerative abilities.
meanings.sent3: The totipotent cells were like the superheroes of the body, ready to transform at any moment.
meanings.sent4: Her potential was totipotent, waiting to bloom into various talents.
meanings.sent5: The totipotent cells' adaptability made them invaluable for medical research.
